summary: This is a forwarded email from July 23, 2019, concerning information about Jeffrey Epstein. The sender expresses that the information received in an attached memo does not match what they were told happened. The email involves personnel from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.

persons.name: Associate Warden MCC New York
persons.context: The email is addressed to or mentions the Associate Warden of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, indicating they are a recipient or subject of the communication regarding information about Epstein.

persons.name: Captain Metropolitan Correctional Center
persons.context: A Captain at the Metropolitan Correctional Center is mentioned in the forwarded email header, suggesting they are involved in the chain of communication or the subject matter.

connections.description: Both are staff members at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, involved in the same email chain concerning information about Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email Regarding Epstein Information Discrepancy
events.description: An email is sent stating that information received in an attached memo about Jeffrey Epstein does not match what the sender was told happened.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated July 23, 2019, concerning Jeffrey Epstein.
The sender indicates a discrepancy between information in an attached memo and what they were told happened regarding Epstein.
The communication involves personnel from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, where Epstein was held.
